tool_description: Get the exchange rates provided by European Central Bank (ECB). 41 currencies quoted against the euro. Data since 1999.
name: Euro exchange rates ECB
title: Euro exchange rates ECB

api_list.name: Get euro exchange rates
api_list.description: The value returned is the exchange rate for the specified date. If there is no data (as in closing days) then the value is empty and there is an error text.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description:
The currency code (3 letters).
Choose one from this 41 currencies: USD, JPY, BGN, CYP, CZK, DKK, EEK, GBP, HUF, LTL, LVL, MTL, PLN, ROL, RON, SEK, SIT, SKK, CHF, ISK, NOK, HRK, RUB, TRL, TRY, AUD, BRL, CAD, CNY, HKD, IDR, ILS, INR, KRW, MXN, MYR, NZD, PHP, SGD, THB, ZAR.
